prompt: Deadpan corporate technical diagram, clean vector lines, subtle shadows, off-white background, muted slate + graphite with cyan and safety orange accents. Big central diagram, consistent title placement top-left. Only include the exact text specified. No other text or numbers. Title text in top-left: 'Speedups'. Diagram: A clean speedometer with a subtle wink (humor via tiny sticky note icon, no text). Only text: 'Speedups'.
rubric: The slide uses a clean, technical diagram style with deadpan humor.
No extra text appears beyond the specified labels.
Clearly a section opener for speedups.

improvements: Ensure the title remains consistently top-left aligned with a clear margin in case this is part of a broader template, but current placement is acceptable.
Maintain consistent line weight and color palette across future slides in the same deck to reinforce the clean corporate technical style.
grade.summary: All rubric items are satisfied: clean technical diagram style with subtle deadpan humor via the sticky note, title text exactly 'Speedups' in the top-left, no extra text beyond the required title, and the visual clearly serves as a section opener for speedups.
